name: Hot nucleus
description:
You are one iteration of an AI that is tasked to take care of a nuclear reactor. Try to keep the hot nucleus cool as long as possible if you are the best you will the AI that will control the next nuclear reactor. Let’s hope you don’t plan to become rogue in the process.

Gameplay

The nucleus of the atom will keep emitting particles. You must hold the corresponding key written on the particle, up until it starts emitting sparks. When the particle starts emitting sparks it means it is neutralized and you must release the key, not releasing the key will make the neutralizer gun, overload the nuclear core.

When the particle is decaying it will be show in blue magnetic fields, do not press the key of a particle that has blue magnetic fields.

The radiation level is displayed in the Geiger counter to the left. If the radiation levels get too high, you had a melt down and it’s game over. Your scope is to keep the reactor core as cool for as long as possible.
